titleStmt.title: Sir Courtly Nice, or, It cannot be a comedy, as it is acted by His Majesties servants / written by Mr. Crown.
titleStmt.author: Crown, Mr. (John), 1640?-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.H. Jun. for R. Bentley ... and Jos. Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Founded on Moreto's play No puede ser, which is itself an imitation of Lope de Vega's Mayor imposible. cf. Camb. Hist. Eng. Lit.
